drupalNodeEvent.title: China and the Global South : From Debt Diplomacy to Dependency?

field_speakers.processed: Jorge Heine (Research Professor, Boston University; Former Ambassador of Chile to China (2014-2017), to India (2003-2007) and to South Africa ( 994-1999), and Cabinet Minister in the Chilean Government)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies

field_description.processed:
Part of the Critical Issues Confronting China Series.
Presented via Zoom Webinar.
Registration Required.
